reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Realization of Child Rights in Somaliland

description.narrative: Save the Children Finland is working with its local partners to enhance the realization of child rights in Borama, Berbera, Hargeisa and nationally in Somaliland. The effects of many years of conflict are still evident in the weaknesses of the national and community child protection structures coupled with absence of a comprehensive law that protects children from harm. Violence against children remains rampant. The project promotes the realization of children?s rights in Somaliland. As a result of this pro ject, children feel that their rights are being respected more than previously and they enjoy their right to a safe, protective and child friendly environment. The beneficiaries of this project are the most vulnerable children. The project is implemented b y YOVENCO in Berbera, AYODA in Boroma and ANPPC.
